name: get_all_scores
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool thefluentme.
Tool description: The AI-powered language pronunciation API with ChatGPT
API description: Get a paginated list of all scores.

Please provide the following parameters in the query string
- **page**: The page number. If no value is provided, the default value of `1` will be applied.
- **per_page**: Scores per page. If no value is provided, the default value of `10` will be applied.

page.description: The page number to retrieve. Defaults to 1.

per_page.description: The number of scores per page. Defaults to 3.
